mapper.select: SELECT CUSTID AS custId, TEMP, PRESSURE, SUGAR, WEIGHT, PULSE, SELFCARE AS selfCare, DAY FROM HEALTHY WHERE CUSTID =#{id} AND DAY = #{week}
mapper.update: UPDATE HEALTHY SET TEMP = #{temp}, PRESSURE = #{pressure}, SUGAR = #{sugar}, WEIGHT = #{weight}, PULSE = #{pulse}, SELFCARE = #{selfCare} WHERE CUSTID = #{custId} AND DAY = #{day}
